content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Used for converting iron ore into iron plates.  
Consists of:
– Furnace (retrieved at Position(5.0, 5.0))

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Used for converting copper ore into copper plates.  
Consists of:
– Furnace (retrieved at Position(-27.0, -60.0))


ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Usage  
  – Errors such as “got an unexpected keyword argument 'radius'” and “takes 0 positional arguments but 3 were given” indicate incorrect parameter usage.  
  – Ensure to review the function’s signature and pass only supported arguments.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval  
  – Errors including “Could not place lab at (0.5, 2.5), No lab in inventory” and “’NoneType’ object is not iterable” occurred when attempting to locate or place a Lab.  
  – Validate that the Lab is available in inventory and that functions returning entities yield an iterable result before processing.

• Lab Crafting Chain Failures  
  – Multiple crafting failures occurred due to missing sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) needed for Lab production.  
  – Confirm that all prerequisite components are produced or available in sufficient quantity before attempting to craft the Lab, and ensure the entire production chain is successfully enabled.
